sentences.en: The city has a superfluity of five-star hotels.
sentences.cn: 这个城市的五星级宾馆太多了。

sentences.en: There is also a superfluity of stop signals.
sentences.cn: 此外,停止符的数量也有冗余.

sentences.en: This book has a superfluity of introductions and summaries.
sentences.cn: 此本书中有多余的介绍和摘要.

sentences.en: Wealth is simply a superfluity of what we don't need.
sentences.cn: 财富只是我们并不需要的多余之物.

words.tran_cn: 额外的，多余的；职责以外的
多余的；不必要的；奢侈的

trans.tran_cn: 过多， 过剩，多余物， 过剩品
trans.tran_en: a larger amount of something than is necessary
